headline: Fortinet: Why This Company Is My Biggest Regret
summary: Fortinet is a top cybersecurity leader with strong growth, profitability, and recurring revenue. Click to find out why FTNT is a Hold and the ideal value to book.

headline: Fortinet to Announce Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results
summary: SUNNYVALE, Calif., July 02, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- News Summary Fortinet® (NASDAQ: FTNT), the global cybersecurity leader driving the convergence of networking and security, announced that it will hold a conference call to discuss its second quarter 2025 financial results on Wednesday, August 6, at 1:30 p.m. Pacific Time (4:30 p.m. Eastern Time). Fortinet's financial results conference call will be broadcast live in listen-only mode on the company’s investor relations website at http://investo

headline: Fortinet: Highly Profitable, Founder-Led, And With Industry Tailwinds
summary: Fortinet's growth is driven by cybersecurity trends, cloud, and AI. Strong leadership, profitability focus, and attractive valuation make it a standout. Read more on FTNT here.
